title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.22 - Creation of obnoxious odors, noxious gases, smoke or fumes prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.22 - Creation of obnoxious odors, noxious gases, smoke or fumes prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall create, or permit any vehicle or
machine of which he is in charge to create, obnoxious odors, noxious gases, smoke or fumes in the terminal. The creation of internal- combustion engine
exhaust-fumes by vehicles in the terminal, so long as such vehicles are
maintained and are being operated in a proper manner, shall not be an
infraction of this section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
